tool_description: Enegaeru Home Energy Usage Optimizer can optimizing your home energy consumption plan.
name: Enegaeru Home Energy Usage Optimizer
title: Enegaeru Home Energy Optimizing Simulator

api_list.name: [Step01] epcorps

required_parameters.name: zip_cd
required_parameters.description: your living place zip code. ex) 1000001

api_list.name: [Step02] eplans
api_list.description: get energy power company's plan list.

required_parameters.name: epcorp_cd
required_parameters.description: epcorp_cd value you can get after calling /epcorps. ex) 4

api_list.name: [Step06] cells
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://enegaeruapi-pv-v3.p.rapidapi.com/cells"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enegaeruapi-pv-v3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://enegaeruapi-pv-v3.p.rapidapi.com/cells"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enegaeruapi-pv-v3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: [Step9] calcprogress
api_list.description: check the status of energy usage optimizing simulation.

required_parameters.name: family_id
required_parameters.description: family_id value that you can get after calling /family ex) 1234567890

required_parameters.name: process_id
required_parameters.description: process_id value that you can get after calling /pvloadcalc. ex) "a35b1b11569e7e340a4350c6aeb42573"

api_list.name: [Step10] pvcalcsmplrpt
api_list.description: get energy usage optimizing simulation result.

required_parameters.name: calc_date
required_parameters.description: calc_date value when you executed YYYY-MM-DD date. ex) 2018-01-01

required_parameters.name: family_id
required_parameters.description: family_id value that you can get after calling /family ex) 1234567890

required_parameters.name: process_id
required_parameters.description: process_id value that you can get after calling /pvloadcalc. ex) "a35b1b11569e7e340a4350c6aeb42573"
